key.name: database-path
key.description: Full path to the location where Pasaffe stores the password database.

key.name: tree-expansion
key.description: How Pasaffe expands the folder tree when starting.

key.name: double-click
key.description: How Pasaffe handles an entry being double-clicked.

key.name: display-usernames
key.summary: Display usernames next to entry names
key.description: When this is true, Pasaffe will display usernames next to entry names.

key.name: idle-timeout
key.description: Number of minutes of inactivity before Pasaffe locks itself.

key.name: lock-on-idle
key.description: When this is true, the Pasaffe window will automatically lock after inactivity.

key.name: only-passwords-are-secret
key.summary: Only passwords are considered to be secret
key.description: When this is true, only the password field is hidden when secrets aren't visible.

key.name: visible-secrets
key.summary: Secrets should be visible by default
key.description: When this is true, secrets are visible in the details pane without user intervention.

key.name: visible-notes
key.summary: Notes will not be visible on the details pane
key.description: When this is true, notes will not be visible in the details pane, and only visible via edit.

key.name: auto-save
key.description: When this is true, Pasaffe will automatically save the database.

key.name: password-length
key.description: Number of characters to generate for random passwords.

key.name: clipboard-timeout
key.description: Number of seconds before Pasaffe clears the clipboard after using it.

key.name: main-size-height
key.description: Sets the current vertical size of the main window.

key.name: main-size-width
key.description: Sets the current horizontal size of the main window.

key.name: main-split
key.description: Sets the current horizontal split of the main window.

key.name: entry-size-height
key.description: Sets the current vertical size of the entry window.

key.name: entry-size-width
key.description: Sets the current horizontal size of the entry window.

key.name: folder-size-height
key.description: Sets the current vertical size of the folder window.

key.name: folder-size-width
key.description: Sets the current horizontal size of the folder window.
